select diseaseclass.code as hea_disease_class_cd ,diseaseclass.code_nm as hea_disease_class_nm ,hd.hea_disease_cd ,hd.hea_disease_nm ,hd.remark ,hd.sort_order ,hd.use_yn ,case when hd.use_yn = 'Y' then '사용' else '미사용' end as use_yn_nm -- 사용여부 ,hd.create_user_id ,createUser.user_nm as create_user_nm ,hd.create_dt ,hd.update_user_id ,updateUser.user_nm as update_user_nm ,hd.update_dt , case when dbo.GET_USER_NM(hd.update_user_id) = '' then dbo.GET_USER_NM(hd.create_user_id) else dbo.GET_USER_NM(hd.update_user_id) end as writer_user_nm , case when hd.update_dt is null then convert(date, hd.create_dt) else convert(date, hd.update_dt) end as writer_dt from hea_disease hd inner join com_code_master diseaseclass on diseaseclass.code = hd.hea_disease_class_cd and diseaseclass.code_group_cd = 'HEA_DISEASE_CLASS' inner join com_user createUser on hd.create_user_id = createUser.user_id left outer join com_user updateUser on hd.update_user_id = updateUser.user_id where diseaseclass.use_yn = 'Y'
and hd.hea_disease_class_cd = #{heaDiseaseClassCd}
and hd.hea_disease_nm like '%' + #{heaDiseaseNm} + '%'
order by writer_dt desc, diseaseclass.sort_order, hd.sort_order

select hea_disease_cd ,hea_disease_class_cd ,hea_disease_nm ,remark ,sort_order ,use_yn ,case when use_yn = 'Y' then '사용' else '미사용' end as use_yn_nm -- 사용여부 ,create_user_id ,create_dt ,update_user_id ,update_dt from hea_disease where 1=1 and hea_disease_cd = #{heaDiseaseCd}
